00027 #include "kvi_settings.h"
00028 
00029 #include <QWidget>
00030 #include <QLineEdit>
00031 #include <QByteArray>
00032 
00033 //
00034 // This is the basic interface of a script editor widget
00035 //
00036 // Actually the REAL script editor is implemented in an
00037 // external module called "libkvieditor", and it is a really
00038 // huge class.
00039 // The constructor of this thing is protected: forget
00040 // about instantiating it directly
00041 //
00042 
00043 
00044 class KVIRC_API KviScriptEditor : public QWidget
00045 {
00046         Q_OBJECT
00047 protected:
00048         KviScriptEditor(QWidget * par);
00049         ~KviScriptEditor();
00050 protected:
00051         QLineEdit * m_pFindLineedit;
00052 public:
00053         virtual void setText(const char * txt);
00054         virtual void setText(const QByteArray &txt);
00055         virtual void setText(const QString &txt);
00056         virtual void getText(QByteArray &txt);
00057         virtual void getText(QString &txt);
00058         virtual void setInfoText(const QString &text);
00059         virtual void setFindText(const QString &text);
00060         virtual void setCursorPosition(int);
00061         virtual void setReadOnly(bool bReadonly);
00062         virtual int getCursor();
00063         virtual void setFindLineeditReadOnly(bool b);
00064         virtual bool isModified();
00065         virtual void setUnHighlightedText(const QString & szText);
00066         virtual void setModified(bool){};
00067         static KviScriptEditor * getDummyEditor(QWidget * par);
00068         static KviScriptEditor * createInstance(QWidget * par);
00069         static void destroyInstance(KviScriptEditor * e);
00070 };
